record.field: The REGE name must be unique.
The "Start Date" must be earlier than the "End Date".
The "Registration Date" must be earlier than the "Exit Date".
The period "%(main)s" overlaps with the following period(s): "%(period)s". Please adjust the date ranges to avoid overlap.
The membership "%(main)s" overlaps with the following membership(s): "%(member)s". Please adjust the date ranges to avoid overlap.
